content.text:
# Big Mama King

| birth_place      = Sokcho, Gangwon-do, South Korea
| genre            = Ballad, R&B
| occupation       = Singer
}}
Kim Hyeon-jeong (, born September 30, 1973), professionally known as BMK or Big Mama King, is a South Korean singer known for her powerful voice.
